programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father dies, four grown siblings, bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week.

programme.title: Ladies in Black
programme.desc: Adapted from the bestselling novel by Madeleine St John, Ladies In Black is an alluring and tender-hearted comedy drama about the lives of a group of department store employees in 1959 Sydney.

programme.title: Life Without Dick
programme.desc: Colleen Gibson, heir to the Rose Red Grapefruit fortune, whose cheating boyfriend Dick is coincidently taken out before singing hitman Daniel has a chance to do the job himself. When Daniel and Colleen meet, sparks fly and Daniel soon discovers that his potential new girlfriend is a much better killer than he is.

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Hedy Carlson and Allie Jones - two women taken to their most primal extremes from which only one can emerge. When Allie throws out her two-timing boyfriend, Hedy suddenly appears to help her fight off the urges to call him back. The surviving half of a set of twins, Hedy seeks someone to complete her, and sees in the chic and articulate Allie everything she would like to be so she not only moves into the apartment, but into the most personal aspects of Allie's life, even going so far as to have her hair styled the same. But when Allie reconciles with her boyfriend, their unspoken bargain goes terrifyingly awry. Instincts don't come baser than this.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Crazy Rich Asians follows native New Yorker Rachel Chu (Constance Wu) as she accompanies her longtime boyfriend, Nick Young (Henry Golding), to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. Excited about visiting Asia for the first time but nervous about meeting Nick's family, Rachel is unprepared to learn that Nick has neglected to mention a few key details about his life. It turns out that he is not only the scion of one of the country's wealthiest families but also one of its most sought-after bachelors. Being on Nick's arm puts a target on Rachel's back, with jealous socialites and, worse, Nick's own disapproving mother (Michelle Yeoh) taking aim. And it soon becomes clear that while money can't buy love, it can definitely complicate things.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Featuring the music of George Michael, this film follows a hapless Londoner who works in a Christmas shop and becomes involved with a man who could be the answer to her problems.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A newly separated teacher gives in to temptation when the handsome teenager next door attempts to seduce her. But trouble ensues when she tries to end the relationship.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father dies, four grown siblings, bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Will Lightman is a good-looking, smooth-talking bachelor whose primary goal in life is avoiding any kind of responsibility. But when he invents an imaginary son in order to meet attractive single mums, Will gets a hilarious lesson about life from a bright, but hopelessly geeky 12-year-old named Marcus. Now, as Will struggles to teach Marcus the art of being cool, Marcus teaches Will that you're never too old to grow up.

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: A resourceful Scottish woman signs up with British Intelligence to find her missing pilot lover. Working undercover as a French housekeeper, she becomes drawn to a mysterious Resistance fighter and pursued by a sinister Nazi collaborator, requiring the plucky patriot to dig deep into her reservoirs of self-sacrifice.

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: A washed-up golf pro takes one last shot at the US Open to win a heart and prove to himself that he's not a loser.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: As teenagers, Allie and Noah begin to fall in love, but they are separated by her upper-class parents who insist that Noah isn't right for her. When they meet years later, their passion is rekindled. Their story is narrated from the present day by an elderly man, telling the tale to a fellow nursing home resident, who is Cassavetes' mother.

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Anna Scott is the world's most famous movie star. Her picture has been plastered on the cover of every magazine, and every time she makes a movie, the entire world knows about it. William Thacker owns a travel bookstore in the quaint neighbourhood of Notting Hill. His business is stagnant, he has the roommate from hell and his love life is completely non-existent. Then one day, their paths cross and the couple comes to face the ultimate question: can two people fall in love with the whole world watching?

programme.title: Mickey Blue Eyes
programme.desc: He walks the wawk. He talks the tawk. Noo Yawk is about to encounter a most unlikely mobster. At the centre of this lively fish-out-of-water comedy romp is a dapper Manhattan art auctioneer named Michael Felgate. Eager to marry Gina, the lovely teacher he's been dating for three months, Michael feels it's time he meet her family. What he meets is the family. Gina's father Frank is a gangster a "juicer" who extracts money for the mob. Now the squeeze is on Michael to use the auction house as a money-laundering scam for dubious artwork, plunging fumbling, bumbling Michael into a world where he must pose as a notorious wise guy called Mickey Blue Eyes. You'll call him hilarious.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Will Lightman is a good-looking, smooth-talking bachelor whose primary goal in life is avoiding any kind of responsibility. But when he invents an imaginary son in order to meet attractive single mums, Will gets a hilarious lesson about life from a bright, but hopelessly geeky 12-year-old named Marcus. Now, as Will struggles to teach Marcus the art of being cool, Marcus teaches Will that you're never too old to grow up.

programme.title: Something New
programme.desc: Kenya McQueen thought she had it all: a successful career, good friends and family. There was just one thing she didn't have under control: her love life. All that changes when she meets sexy, free-spirited Brian Kelly. But when her ideal man arrives on the scene, Kenya must decide between the relationship everyone expects and the romance no one expected.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Milo Boyd, a down-on-his-luck bounty hunter, gets his dream job when he is assigned to track down his bail-jumping ex-wife, reporter Nicole Hurly. He thinks all that's ahead is an easy payday, but when Nicole gives him the slip so she can chase a lead on a murder cover-up, Milo realises that nothing ever goes simply with him and Nicole. The exes continually one-up each other until they find themselves on the run for their lives. They thought their promise to love, honour and obey was tough, staying alive is going to be a whole lot tougher.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie Bradshaw, successful author and everyone's favourite fashion icon-next-door, is back, her famously sardonic wit intact and sharper than ever, as she continues to narrate her own story about sex, love and the fashion-obsessed single woman in New York City. Sex and the City finds Carrie, Samantha, Charlotte, and Miranda four years after the hit series ended, as our favourite friends continue to juggle jobs and relationships while navigating motherhood, marriage and Manhattan real estate.

programme.title: For Love Of The Game
programme.desc: When a legendary pitcher strikes out with his girlfriend, he has to play the game of his life. The suspense lasts until the last ball is thrown in this heartwarming drama.

programme.title: Dave
programme.desc: An uncanny presidential lookalike is recruited as a momentary stand-in for American's Chief Executive. However, things don't turn out exactly as planned, and Dave finds himself continuing the masquerade indefinitely.

programme.title: Something to Talk About
programme.desc: A contemporary Southern wife and mother has the 'perfect life'. But when she learns that her husband has been unfaithful, she steps back and examines her life from a new perspective.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: Oscar is a fast-talking little fish whose big dreams have a habit of landing him in hot water. Lenny is a great white shark with a sensitive side and a secret: he's a vegetarian.

programme.desc: Little sparrow Richard meets a flock of sparrows who are being held captive by the peacock Zamano. To regain their freedom, they have to go on a great adventure together and find a mysterious treasure.

programme.title: Puss in Boots
programme.desc: Before he met the ogre Shrek, Puss in Boots (voice of Antonio Banderas) had a complicated life in which he was smeared with the blame of a bank robbery in San Ricardo, engineered against Puss' wishes by Humpty Dumpty (Zach Galifianakis), who was captured while trying to escape - thanks to Puss leaving him to his fate in anger. The two lifelong friends break up and it isn't until they re-unite that they trust each other again.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Alex the lion is the king of the urban jungle, the main attraction at New York's Central Park Zoo. He and his best friends, Marty the zebra, Melman the giraffe and Gloria the hippo have spent their whole lives in blissful captivity before an admiring public and with regular meals provided for them. Not content to leave well enough alone, Marty lets his curiosity get the better of him and makes his escape with the help of some prodigious penguins to explore the world.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: George and Harold are fourth-grade BFFs who love dreaming up funny pranks. One day, they accidentally hypnotise their principal into believing he's a dimwitted hero named Captain Underpants. But when the new schoolteacher turns out to be a disgraced scientist bent on ridding the world of laughter, George, Harold and Captain Underpants must band together to stop his evil agenda.

programme.title: Dora's Enchanted Forest Adventures
programme.desc: Explore the Enchanted Forest with Dora, Boots, and King Unicornio in this trilogy of magical adventures, concluding in an enchanted double-length episode.

programme.title: Chicken Run
programme.desc: While the chickens on evil Mrs Tweedy's farm dream of a better life, a clever hen named Ginger is hatching plans to fly the coop for good. The only problem is, chickens can't fly or can they? Every escape attempt goes fowl until Rocky, a smooth-talking All-American rooster, crash-lands into the coop. It's hardly poultry in motion when Rocky attempts to teach Ginger and her fine feathered friends to fly but, with teamwork, determination and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt in a spectacular bid for freedom! Featuring unforgettable characters, incredible animation and all-star voice talent, this instant classic from the academy Award-winning creators of Wallace & Gromit is eggs-traordinary fun for the whole family!

It's hardly poultry in motion when Rocky attempts to teach Ginger and her fine feathered friends to fly but, with teamwork, determination and a little bit of cluck, the fearless flock plots one last daring attempt in a spectacular bid for freedom! Featuring unforgettable characters, incredible animation and all-star voice talent, this instant classic from the academy Award-winning creators of Wallace & Gromit is eggs-traordinary fun for the whole family!

Wonderland is full of fantastical rides and talking animals, however it is in disarray. June soon discovers that the park came from her imagination and she's the only one who can fix it.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: This film tells the story of the world's first family road trip. When their cave is destroyed, the Crood family must embark on a comedy adventure into strange and spectacular territory in search of a new home. As if patriarch Grug didn't already have enough to handle, it goes from bad to worse when they encounter an imaginative nomad named Guy. With Guy's help the Croods conquer their fear of the outside world and discover that they have exactly what it takes to survive - each other.

programme.title: The Grinch
programme.desc: For their eighth fully animated feature, Illumination and Universal Pictures present "The Grinch," based on Dr. Seuss' beloved holiday classic. The Grinch tells the story of a cynical grump who goes on a mission to steal Christmas, only to have his heart changed by a young girl's generous holiday spirit. Funny, heartwarming and visually stunning, it's a universal story about the spirit of Christmas and the indomitable power of optimism.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Gru, his adorable girls, and the mischievous Minions are back with a cast of unforgettable new characters in the blockbuster sequel to the worldwide phenomenon. Partnered with secret agent Lucy Wilde, Gru, along with the wildly unpredictable Minions, must figure out how to keep his cover while also keeping up with his duties as a father. programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: Boog plans an annual hunting trip for his woodland buddies but they choose family obligations which made Boog take a trip on his own leading him to a circus. He meets with Alistair a devious grizzly who wants to get out of the circus so he convinces Boog to switch places for his life in the wild for Alistair's place at the circus. While attending, Boog then falls for an alluring troupe member. Then the greedy circus ringmaster takes advantage of Boog by causing him misery and humiliation. When Boog's pals finds out about his disappearance, they hatch a rescue mission to rescue Boog and his true love.

programme.title: Dora's Royal Rescue
programme.desc: In 'Dora's Royal Rescue,' Dora's a knight and Boots is her squire as they help the noble horse Rocinante, rescue Don Quixote who is imprisoned by Malambruno, an evil wizard, in an abandoned library inside Story Castle.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An ogre, with the help of an annoying donkey, tries to win back his swamp by returning a princess to a scheming lord.

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: The Mallard family embark on a journey south for the winter to Jamaica via New York City, only for their well-laid plans to go awry, leading to new friends and unknown horizons.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: The classic story of loyalty, trust and sacrifice comes to life in this live-action adaptation. Wilbur is a terrific and radiant pig. Once Wilbur moves into a new barn, he begins a friendship with the most unlikely of creatures - a spider named Charlotte - and their bond inspires the animals to come together as a family. When the word gets out that Wilbur's days are numbered, it seems that only a miracle will save his life. A determined Charlotte - who sees miracles in the ordinary - spins words into her web in an effort to convince the farmer that Wilbur is 'some pig' and worth saving.

programme.title: The Croods: A New Age
programme.desc: In search of a new home, the Croods encounter the more sophisticated Betterman family. A new threat forces the two families to set aside their differences to avoid extinction.

programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: He's mean and green and he hates the yo-ho-hoing. The Grinch conspires to steal Christmas from Whoville, making off with the presents, decorations, trees and every other joyful thing.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin put their parenting skills to the test in this hilarious caper about two sacked admen and newly stay-at-home dads who open their own day-care centre.

programme.title: Scoob!
programme.desc: "Scoob!" reveals how lifelong friends Scooby and Shaggy first met and how they joined with young detectives Fred, Velma and Daphne to form the famous Mystery Inc. Now, with hundreds of cases solved and adventures shared, Scooby and the gang face their biggest, most challenging mystery ever, a plot to unleash the ghost dog Cerberus upon the world. As they race to stop this global "dogpocalypse", the gang discovers that Scooby has a secret legacy and an epic destiny greater than anyone imagined.

programme.title: Scoob!

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: In the not-so distant future, the Earth is on the verge of total collapse. Chosen as the perfect' candidates to colonise space are the Robinson family: Professor John Robinson, his wife Maureen, their daughters - the lovely Doctor Judy Robinson and her dreamy younger sister Penny, and their genius 10-year-old son Will. Their mission: to fly a sleep spaceship to the nearest star, Alpha Centuri, and create a new home for human beings. Assigned to pilot the craft is Major Don West - cute, cocky, but ever so irresistible, especially to Judy. Sabotaging the Robinsons' mission is double crossing spy, Dr Zachary Smith, who tries to re-programme the ship's robot Robbie to destroy the family, but instead sets it off course and out of touch with civilisation. Bloody battles with giant acid-dripping moon spiders, meetings with alien lizard monkeys, and time portals that bring the family face to face with their future selves - are all in store for the Robinsons. All these adventures are just part of a mind-bending rollercoaster ride during which, lost in the darkness of space, they must come together as a family to reach Alpha Centuri before all hope for Planet Earth is gone.

programme.title: Migration

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A high velocity comedy about an underdog snail who kicks into overdrive when he miraculously attains the power of super-speed. But after making fast friends with a crew of streetwise, tricked-out es-car-goes, Turbo learns that no one succeeds on their own. So he puts his heart and shell on the line to help his pals achieve their dreams, before Turbo-charging his own impossible dream: winning the Indy 500.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: Jet To The Rescue
programme.desc: When the scheming Duke of Flappington steals a powerful levitation gem from the royal castle and uses its magical powers to raise Barkingburg into the clouds, Skye will need to overcome her fears and lead the team in their biggest aerial rescue yet!

programme.title: Nanny McPhee & The Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee appears at the door of a stressed young mother, who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war. But once she's arrived, Nanny McPhee discovers that the children are fighting a war of their own against two spoiled city cousins who have just moved in and refuse to leave.

programme.title: The Sloth Lane
programme.desc: After a terrifying storm destroys their home, a speedy sloth named Laura and her kooky family move to the big city in their rusted old food truck hoping to make their business a success.

programme.title: Dinosaur Train: Adventure Island
programme.desc: Dinosaur siblings Buddy, Tiny, Shiny and Don try to reunite with their parents after an earthquake causes theme park robots to go rogue.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: Move over, Mary Poppins. Nanny McPhee is a wonderfully hideous, mysterious nanny hired to tame seven brats with a feckless father.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a doubting boy boards a magical train that's headed to the North Pole and Santa Claus's home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Clumsy and overweight panda, Po, dreams of becoming a kung fu master.

programme.title: Tom & Jerry
programme.desc: A legendary rivalry re-emerges when Jerry moves into New York City's finest hotel on the eve of the wedding of the century, forcing the desperate event planner to hire Tom to get rid of him. As mayhem ensues, the escalating cat-and-mouse battle soon threatens to destroy her career, the wedding, and possibly the hotel itself.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: A bee is abuzz over a scandal: people are stealing honey to eat. With the help of a florist, he sues the human race for 'honey laundering'.

programme.title: Under The Boardwalk
programme.desc: When timid Jersey crab Armen meets bold tourist sea crab Ramona, it causes tension in the community. But when the duo are swept away by a storm, they embark on an epic journey to find home.

programme.title: Dora's Christmas Carol Adventure

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Alex the lion is the king of the urban jungle, the main attraction at New York's Central Park Zoo. He and his best friends, Marty the zebra, Melman the giraffe and Gloria the hippo have spent their whole lives in blissful captivity before an admiring public and with regular meals provided for them. Not content to leave well enough alone, Marty lets his curiosity get the better of him and makes his escape with the help of some prodigious penguins to explore the world.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: A tale which follows the adventures of a wild and rambunctious mustang stallion as he journeys through the untamed American frontiers, encountering man for the first time, Spirit defies being broken, even as he develops a remarkable friendship with a young Lakota brave named Little Creek. The young stallion also finds love with a beautiful paint mare named Rain on his way to becoming one of the greatest unsung heroes of the Old West.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: The Cat in the Hat who goes by that name is played by Mike Myers of comedy fame! It starts with two kids on a cold, cold wet day their mum is at work and they've no games to play! Then in walks the fun in the form of a Cat who pulls out the laughs from the brim of his hat. Things really get wild when the Cat and his crew (who go by the name of Thing One and Thing Two) take over the house of Conrad and Sally in this fine family film that's right up your alley!

programme.title: Wallace & Gromit: Curse Of Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit's latest enterprise is Anti-Pesto, pest control with a heart. When called upon by the dotty Lady Tottington to solve her rabbit infestation, Wallace tangles with her Ladyship's would-be suitor, rotten cad Victor Quartermaine. At first Wallace and Gromit seem to have things in hand. But Wallace's mind transference device malfunctions, and he's in danger of being bagged by Quartermaine. Wallace teeters perilously close to disaster and his four-legged pal, Gromit, faces almost insurmountable odds to save the day!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior. But his new life is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret weapon to conquer China.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, things are about to take a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: Spring has sprung, and Verne and his woodland friends awaken from their long winter's nap to discover that a large, green hedge has cropped up right through the middle of their once-natural habitat. Enter RJ, an opportunistic raccoon who explains that the world beyond the hedge is 'the gateway to the good life' where peculiar creatures called humans live to eat, rather than eat to live. "For humans," RJ proclaims, "enough is never enough."

programme.title: The Tiger's Apprentice
programme.desc: Tom Lee discovers he is part of a long lineage of magical protectors known as the Guardians. With guidance from a mythical tiger named Hu, Tom trains to take on an evil force that threatens humanity.

programme.title: Richard the Stork and the Mystery of ...
programme.desc: Little sparrow Richard meets a flock of sparrows who are being held captive by the peacock Zamano. To regain their freedom, they have to go on a great adventure together and find a mysterious treasure.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Banning is a 40-year-old corporate takeover lawyer who has lost any memory of being Peter Pan. Peter and his family travel to London to visit Granny Wendy. Peter discovers a note from Captain Hook informing Peter that he has kidnapped his children. With the encouragement of Tinkerbell, Peter once again takes wing, and it's off to Neverland to rescue his kids.

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Storks deliver babies or at least they used to. Now they deliver packages for a global internet retail giant. Junior, the company's top delivery stork, is about to be promoted when he accidentally activates the Baby Making Machine, producing an adorable and wholly unauthorised baby girl.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, things are about to take a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude. In the film, Peter's feud with Mr. McGregor escalates to greater heights than ever before as they rival for the affections of the warm-hearted animal lover who lives next door.

programme.title: Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Recruited from youngsters into the global spy game, four penguins are called into action by a mysterious espionage organisation in order to save the world from a villainous octopus.

programme.title: The Pirates! Band of Misfits
programme.desc: Set sail for a fun-filled voyage and hilarious pirate antics with the biggest band of misfits on the seven seas. When the infamous Pirate Captain is shunned once again by his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz, he sets his sights to win the coveted Pirate of the Year Award. With his trusted dodo, Polly, and ragtag crew at his side, the Pirate Captain will need to battle a diabolical queen, save a young scientist and never lose sight of what a pirate loves best: adventure.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Worried that his half-vampire grandson isn't showing signs of being a vampire, Dracula enlists his friends to put him through 'monster-in-training' boot camp.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: When Po's long-lost panda father suddenly reappears, the reunited duo travels to a secret panda paradise to meet scores of hilarious new panda characters. When the supernatural villain Kai begins to sweep across China defeating all the kung fu masters, Po must do the impossible: learn to train a village full of his fun-loving, clumsy brethren to become the ultimate band of kung fu pandas.

programme.title: Megamind
programme.desc: Megamind is the most brilliant super-villain the world has ever known, and the least successful. Over the years he has tried to conquer Metro City in every imaginable way. Each attempt, a colossal failure thanks to the caped superhero known as Metro Man, until the day Megamind actually defeats him in the throes of one of his botched evil plans. Suddenly, the fate of Metro City is threatened when a new villain arrives and chaos runs rampant, leaving everyone to wonder: can the world's biggest 'mind' actually save the day?

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An ogre, with the help of an annoying donkey, tries to win back his swamp by returning a princess to a scheming lord.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: A mysterious map sets Smurfette, and her best friends Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty, on an exciting and thrilling race through the Forbidden Forest, filled with magical creatures, to find a mysterious lost village before the evil wizard Gargamel does. Embarking on a roller-coaster journey full of action and danger, the Smurfs are on a course that leads to the discovery of the biggest secret in Smurf history.

programme.title: The Rugrats Movie
programme.desc: Hang on to your diapers! The Rugrats babies, intrepid explorers and stars of the wildly-popular animated series, are off on their first feature-length adventure. With the birth of his new baby brother Dylan, Tommy Pickles knew things were about to change, but he never expected that being a big brother could be such an adventure. While attempting to return Dil to 'hopsical', the Rugrats commandeer the Reptar Wagon and inadvertently get lost in the forest. It's a rollicking, musical ride into a world beyond their backyard as the Rugrats encounter obstacles and some big surprises in their quest to get back home.

There he remains trapped for 26 years, until two newly orphaned children, Judy and Peter, playing in the attic of Alan's childhood home, free the now-adult Alan from the game's clutches. Grant, Whale Nation takes us on a journey of discovery into the unexplored territories and barely known society of whales, with their remarkable abilities and incredibly rich and complex social lives. programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Forty-year-old Andy Stitzer has done quite a few things in his life. He's got a cushy job stamping invoices at an electronics superstore, a nice apartment with a proud collection of action figures and comic books, good friends, a nice attitude. But there's just one little thing he hasn't quite gotten around to doing yet - something most people have done by his age. Done a lot. Andy's never, ever, ever had sex - not even by accident. So is that such a big deal? Well, for Andy's buds at the store, it sure is. Although they think he's a bit of an oddball, there's certainly a planet full of stranger (and homelier) guys who've at least had one go at having a go. They consider it their duty to help Andy out of his dire situation and go to great lengths to help him.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: America's funniest family back for seconds! The hilarity begins when professor Sherman Klump finds romance with fellow DNA specialist, Denise Gaines, and discovers a brilliant formula that reverses ageing. But Sherman's thin and obnoxious alter ego, Buddy Love, wants out and a big piece of the action. And when Buddy gets loose, things get seriously nutty. Now, it's up to Mama, Papa, Ernie and Granny Klump to throw their weight around and save the day in this whopping, gut-busting comedy.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: This film follows devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon as he butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay. For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Baywatch

For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Two brothers whose eccentric mother raised them to believe their father had died when they were young, discover this to be a lie. So they set out to find their real father, learning more about their mother than they probably ever wanted to know.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Misfit NYPD detectives, Gamble and Hoitz, are sentenced to life behind the desk. They hate each other and the monotony of their meaningless jobs, as they're forced to live in the shadow of the two biggest and most badass cops on the force. But when those guys go down for the count, opportunity knocks for Gamble and Hoitz. Stumbling onto what could be one of the biggest crimes in years, can the other guys step up their game to solve the case without killing each other and destroying NYC in the process?

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Allison Scott is an up-and-coming entertainment journalist whose 24-year-old life is on the fast track. But it gets seriously derailed when a drunken one-night stand with slacker Ben Stone results in an unexpected pregnancy. Faced with the prospect of going it alone or getting to know the baby's father, Allison decides to give the lovable layabout a chance. An overgrown kid with no desire to settle down, Ben learns he has a big decision to make with his kid's mother-to-be: will he run or stay?

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who can't be stopped - but he's making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: CHIPS
programme.desc: When an inexperienced rookie and a hardened pro in the Highway Patrol are teamed together, they clash more than click, kick-starting a partnership that is easier said than done.

programme.title: CHIPS

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: Grizzled former professional baseball player Morris Buttermaker (Billy Bob Thornton) is recruited by a strait-laced lawyer (Marcia Gay Harden) to coach the Bears, a woefully inept Little League team. He's got to find a way to drive this gang of 12 misfits to a championship against their hated rivals: the Yankees and their overbearing coach (Greg Kinnear). A hilarious homage to an irreverent 1976 comedy, THE BAD NEWS BEARS.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: When he is ruled to be property and not a person, a foul-mouthed teddy bear seeks the aid of a legendary civil rights attorney to gain the justice he deserves.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: Evan Danielson finds it difficult to connect with his seven-year-old daughter, Olivia. Evan is too distracted by his career demands to understand the value of quality father-daughter time, and Olivia has all but given up on her father. When the promotion of a lifetime is suddenly within his reach, Evan finds himself torn between his parental responsibilities and staving off his company rival, the annoyingly pseudo-mystical Johnny Whitefeather. Evan has always been a man in complete control, but when he really starts to lose it, Olivia steps in with her own bit of advice: winning stock tips courtesy of the princesses and queen who she visits through her security blanket, her 'Goo-Gaa'.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Dr Sherman Klump, a kind, calorically challenged genetics professor who longs to shed his 400-pound frame in order to win the heart of the beautiful Carla Purty. So, with one swig of his experimental fat-reducing serum, Sherman becomes Buddy Love, a fast-talking, pumped up, plumped-down Don Juan. Can Sherman stop his buff alter ego before it's too late, or will Buddy have the last laugh?

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Sent to prison for insider trading, a titan of industry emerges ready to rebrand herself as America's latest sweetheart, but not everyone is so quick to forgive and forget.

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: Deuce's European vacation riot goes from gigolo school in England to Amsterdam. He's on the trail of a killer who's knocking off the city's greatest gigolos.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Nicholas Angel is a big-city cop who can't be stopped - but he's making everyone else on the force look bad. When he is reassigned to a small, quiet town, he struggles with this new, seemingly idyllic world and his bumbling partner. But their dull existence is interrupted by several grisly and suspicious accidents, and the crime-fighting duo turn up the heat and hand out high-octane, car-chasing, gun-fighting, big-city justice.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Chuck Levine and Larry Valentine are fire fighters and true-blue buddies. When Larry, a widower, learns he cannot name his children as beneficiaries on his life insurance policy, he needs a big favour from Chuck: Sign on as Larry's domestic partner. The pals unexpectedly become front-page news and must carry the masquerade to extremes when an overzealous bureaucrat becomes suspicious of their true relationship.

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: A hilarious, heartfelt look at one guy's arduous quest to grow up and get over the heartbreak of being dumped. Struggling musician Peter, after he is jilted by his television star girlfriend Sarah for another guy, runs off to Hawaii on a vacation only to find his ex staying in the same hotel with her new man.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he can't find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddy's high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you can't learn in books. Night School is in session!

programme.title: Liar Liar
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer and habitual liar discovers that he is unable to tell a lie or withhold the truth about anything for 24 hours after his son makes a birthday wish that comes true.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Fed up with answering to higher-ups, Nick, Kurt and Dale decide to become their own bosses and launch their own business. Soon, though, a slick investor pulls the rug out from under them. Outplayed and desperate, and with no legal recourse, the three would-be entrepreneurs hatch a misguided plan to kidnap the investor's adult son and ransom him to regain control of their company.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Male nurse Greg Focker is poised to propose to his girlfriend Pam during a weekend stay at her parents' home. But here's the catch he needs to ask her father first. Alas, the fur flies as Jack Byrnes, Pam's cat-crazy, ex-CIA father takes an immediate dislike to her less-than-truthful beau. Greg's quest for approval gets seriously side-tracked as Murphy's Law takes over and a hilarious string of mishaps turns him into a master of disaster and total pariah in the eyes of the entire family, all except for his shell-shocked girlfriend, who can't believe she still lovers her one-man wrecking crew.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: As a crime wave sweeps the city and the police department suffers a shortage of officers, the mayor decrees that admission to the Police Academy will be open to any and all applicants. Now the first cadets, a collection of oddballs, eccentrics and misfits will soon be let loose on the streets. That is if they somehow manage to graduate in this worldwide hit comedy that started the series of Police Academy films.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Twenty-seven-year-old Billy Madison must repeat all 12 grades of school in just 24 weeks to earn his father's respect, and prove he has what it takes to run the family's multimillion-dollar empire. Along the way, Billy falls for his third grade teacher, gets kicked out of school and must face off with his nemesis, not to mention a pesky penguin.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant whose glory days are behind him, bumps into a formerly nerdy classmate and is pulled into the high-stakes world of international espionage.

programme.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?
programme.desc: A delightful comedy about finding love in the most unexpected places. Two successful New Yorkers, Paul and Meryl, are at their wits' end with repairing their strained marriage. But when they become the only witnesses to a brutal murder, the police hide them away in Wyoming, together. Now these die-hard city dwellers will have to survive the weather, bears, fresh air, and forced time with one another if they want to make it out alive.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Misfit NYPD detectives, Gamble and Hoitz, are sentenced to life behind the desk. They hate each other and the monotony of their meaningless jobs, as they're forced to live in the shadow of the two biggest and most badass cops on the force. But when those guys go down for the count, opportunity knocks for Gamble and Hoitz. Stumbling onto what could be one of the biggest crimes in years, can the other guys step up their game to solve the case without killing each other and destroying NYC in the process?

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Nerdy college student Columbus has survived the plague that has turned mankind into flesh-devouring zombies because he's scared of just about everything. Gun-toting, Twinkie-loving Tallahassee has no fears. Together, they are about to stare down their most horrifying challenge yet: each other's company.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every man's life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, it's up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant whose glory days are behind him, bumps into a formerly nerdy classmate and is pulled into the high-stakes world of international espionage.

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Clear the runway for Derek Zoolander, VH1's three-time male model of the year but his face falls when hippie-chic 'he's so hot right now' Hansel scooters in to steal this year's award. The evil fashion guru Mugatu seizes the opportunity to turn Derek into a killing machine. It's a well-designed conspiracy and only with the help of Hansel and a few well-chosen accessories can Derek make the world safe.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Having finally gotten used to each other's existence, Brad and Dusty must now deal with their intrusive fathers during the holidays.

programme.title: The Other Guys

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Get ready for a gut-busting, bone-mashing good time in this hilarious horror comedy. There comes a day in every man's life when he has to get off the couch and kill some zombies. When flesh-eating zombies are on the hunt for a bite to eat, it's up to slacker Shaun and his best pal to save their friends and family from becoming the next entree.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A fast talking con-artist Rayford Gibson and conservative bank teller Claude Banks are accidently teamed up to become the funniest odd couple east of the Mississippi. In an effort to pay off Ray's debt and restore Claude's reputation, they travel south on a bootlegging run for some quick cash. There is no limit to their comical misfortune as they are placed at the scene of a crime and their mistaken identity lands them right in the front of the judge. The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: Guided by a set of "wedding crashing rules," John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey can charm their way into any wedding and into the hearts of every bridesmaid. But at the biggest nuptials of the year, John breaks the rules and falls for the daughter of the US Secretary of Treasury, and Jeremy is left at the mercy of her "stage-five-clinger" sister. Being there for his buddy, Jeremy follows John to the family's huge estate for a weekend that may even be too wild for these professional party guys.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his step-father Frank Powell, who's a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions and definitely doesn't respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, 'you never sneak up on a man whose been in a chemical fire'. But when Frank falls ill, it's up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Frank's heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: This film follows devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon as he butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay. For a generation of TV fans the world over, the name Baywatch conjures up images of sun, surf and statuesque lifeguards, running in slow-motion in form-fitting red swimsuits.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: Brad Taggart is a kind-hearted radio executive who wants to be the best possible stepfather to his wife's two children. When her freewheeling ex-husband Dusty breezes back into town, Brad's feeling of insecurity quickly develops into an inferiority complex. As Dusty demonstrates his flair for athletics, home repair and bad-boy charisma, Taggart finds himself in a no-holds-barred battle to one-up his rival and win the approval of his family.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: With a heart that won't quit, a stomach that won't stop gurgling and a self-sworn oath to protect his turf, he's Paul Blart: Mall Cop. Mild-mannered Paul Blart has always had huge dreams of becoming a State Trooper. Until then, he patrols the local mall as a security guard. With his closely cropped moustache, personal transporter and gung-ho attitude, only Blart seems to take his job seriously. All that changes when a team of thugs raid the mall and take hostages. Untrained, unarmed and a super-size target, Blart has to become a real cop to save the day.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A has-been scientist, Dr Rick Marshall, gets more than he bargained for when his expedition takes a wrong turn into the Land of the Lost. Now, Marshall, his crack-smart research assistant, Holly, and a redneck survivalist named Will have no weapons, few skills and questionable smarts to survive in a world full of marauding dinosaurs, fantastic creatures and laugh-out-loud comedy.

The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: He's the best there is. In fact, he's the only one there is! He's Ace Ventura Pet Detective and he's on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eyeball to eyeball with a man-eating shark, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. Whether he's undercover, under fire or underwater, he always gets his man or beast.

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: When Albert loses his girlfriend to his moustached nemesis, a mysterious and beautiful woman rides into town and turns his luck around. But when her notorious outlaw husband arrives seeking revenge, Albert must put his new-found courage to the test.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: After his dream of stardom on the hockey ice melts, Happy Gilmore discovers he has a gift that could bring him glory on the greens. Trouble is, with his hot head and hard-hitting drives, Happy doesn't just play golf, he destroys it. With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Life flips over for a small-town pizzeria owner and poet who inherits $40 billion. Sleazy moguls come to whisk him and his money away to corporate America.

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: Upon realising that he has no male friends close enough to serve as his best man, a husband-to-be immediately embarks on a series of bizarre and awkward man-dates to find such a friend.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: Now that Mac and Kelly Radner have a second baby on the way, they are ready to make the final move into adulthood: the suburbs. But just as they thought they'd reclaimed the neighbourhood and were safe to sell, they learn that the new occupants next door are a sorority even more out of control than Teddy and his brothers ever dreamed of being. Tired of their school's sexist, restrictive system, the unorthodox ladies of Kappa Nu have decided to start a house where they can do whatever the hell they want. When Shelby and her sisters, Beth and Nora, find the perfect place just off campus, they won't let the fact that its located on a quiet street stand in their way of parties as epic as the guys throw.

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: One of television's most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken 'Hutch' Hutchinson as they're paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he can't find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddy's high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you can't learn in books. Night School is in session!

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When grandfather Ed moves in, Peter is forced to give up his bedroom. Unwilling to tolerate this injustice, Peter devises a series of pranks to drive him out.

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When grandfather Ed moves in, Peter is forced to give up his bedroom. Unwilling to tolerate this injustice, Peter devises a series of pranks to drive him out.

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Amateur stuntman Rod Kimble has got a problem with his step-father Frank Powell, who's a real jerk. Frank picks on Rod, tosses him around like a rag doll in their weekly sparring sessions and definitely doesn't respect him, much less his stunts - as he says, 'you never sneak up on a man whose been in a chemical fire'. But when Frank falls ill, it's up to Rod to stage the stunt jump of his life in order to raise the money for Frank's heart operation and save him.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: After his dream of stardom on the hockey ice melts, Happy Gilmore discovers he has a gift that could bring him glory on the greens. Trouble is, with his hot head and hard-hitting drives, Happy doesn't just play golf, he destroys it. With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: Upon realising that he has no male friends close enough to serve as his best man, a husband-to-be immediately embarks on a series of bizarre and awkward man-dates to find such a friend.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: Playboy bunny Shelley Darlington is tossed out of the Playboy Mansion with nowhere to go. Somehow fate delivers Shelley to the sorority girls of Zeta Alpha Zeta, a clueless bunch who stand to lose their house, unless they can learn what only Shelley can teach them. And Shelley learns that boys really like what's on the inside too.

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: One of television's most popular duos heads to the big screen in this parody of the popular 1970s series. Join uptight David Starsky and laid-back Ken 'Hutch' Hutchinson as they're paired for the first time as undercover cops. The new partners must overcome their differences to solve an important case with help from street informant, Huggy Bear and persuasive criminal, Reese Feldman.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: When accidentally destroying his workplace gets successful salesman Teddy fired, he can't find another decent job unless he finally gets his GED. But two major things stand in his way: Carrie, a teacher with no time for grown-up class clowns, and Stewart, Teddy's high school nemesis-turned-principal who will do anything to see him fail. Now every school rule is about to be broken when they all go head-to-head in a wild battle of wits, pranks, and lessons you can't learn in books. Night School is in session!

programme.title: The War With Grandpa
programme.desc: When grandfather Ed moves in, Peter is forced to give up his bedroom. Unwilling to tolerate this injustice, Peter devises a series of pranks to drive him out.

programme.title: Half-Baked: Totally High
programme.desc: Three potheads sell a strain of magical weed to raise funds for their friend's funeral.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: He's the best there is. In fact, he's the only one there is! He's Ace Ventura Pet Detective and he's on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eyeball to eyeball with a man-eating shark, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. Whether he's undercover, under fire or underwater, he always gets his man or beast.

programme.title: Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is a London museum guard sent to Los Angeles in charge of a priceless painting. Mayhem erupts when the famously eccentric simpleton is mistaken for an art expert.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Chuck Levine and Larry Valentine are fire fighters and true-blue buddies. When Larry, a widower, learns he cannot name his children as beneficiaries on his life insurance policy, he needs a big favour from Chuck: Sign on as Larry's domestic partner. The pals unexpectedly become front-page news and must carry the masquerade to extremes when an overzealous bureaucrat becomes suspicious of their true relationship.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: Allison Scott is an up-and-coming entertainment journalist whose 24-year-old life is on the fast track. But it gets seriously derailed when a drunken one-night stand with slacker Ben Stone results in an unexpected pregnancy. Faced with the prospect of going it alone or getting to know the baby's father, Allison decides to give the lovable layabout a chance. An overgrown kid with no desire to settle down, Ben learns he has a big decision to make with his kid's mother-to-be: will he run or stay?

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug and his three friends drive to Las Vegas for a blow-out bachelor party they'll never forget. But, in fact, when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning, they can't remember a thing. For some reason, they find a tiger in the bathroom and a six-month-old baby in the closet of their suite at Caesars Palace. The one thing they can't find is Doug. With no clue as to what transpired and little time to spare, the trio must retrace their hazy steps and all their bad decisions in order to figure out where things went wrong and hopefully get Doug back to LA in time to walk down the aisle.

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: For one month every year, five highly competitive friends hit the ground running in a no-holds-barred game of tag they've been playing since the first grade, risking their necks, their jobs and their relationships to take each other down with the battle cry: "You're It!" This year, the game coincides with the wedding of their only undefeated player, which should finally make him an easy target. But he knows they're coming and he's ready.

programme.title: Half-Baked: Totally High
programme.desc: Three potheads sell a strain of magical weed to raise funds for their friend's funeral.
